name: Tetromino Dominoes, Geronimo!
description:
In Tetromino Dominoes, Geronimo! you uncontrollably stack tetrominoes up to infinity. Post your high scores in the comments!

Controls:
- RMB & drag to move camera up/down
- LMB to place a tetromino (early)
- Scroll to rotate the pieces
You gain health from reaching new heights, and lose health as pieces fall to the void.
